title: Tropic Blunder
description: The true story behind the making of the most expensive fake true war story ever. Sergeant John “Four Leaf” Tayback and the Vietnam jungle are full of surprises. Winner of eight Academy Awards.
quote: They’re trained soldiers.” “Yes, but we are trained actors.
starring: Tugg Speedman, Kirk Lazarus, Jeff Portnoy, Kevin Sandusky, Alpa Chino
altHero: Tugg Speedman, dirty and torn from war, raises his arms in exhaustion as the jungle behind him burns
alt1: American soldiers walking through the Vietnam jungle
alt2: Speedman shirtless and covered in dirt and bloody warpaint, wears a panda’s head as a hat
alt4: Kirk Lazarus looks relieved but exhausted
